original_text: it's been 13 months and 295 preview screenings since i last walked out on a movie , but resident evil really earned my indignant , preemptive departure .
generated_text:
1. "I've seen some stinkers in my time, but 'The Last Airbender' takes the cake. I walked out on it after 20 minutes, and I'm still fuming."
2. "I've never left a movie theater before, but 'Battlefield Earth' was so bad I didn't want to be associated with it anymore."
3. "I've been to a lot of bad movies, but 'The Happening' was the first one I ever got up and walked out on."
4. "I've never been so disgusted with a film as I was with 'The Room'. I left the theater feeling like I'd been punched in the gut."
